data.meta_site_name: Council Bluffs Area Chamber of Commerce
data.text:
Since 1916, the Council Bluffs Area Chamber of Commerce has led the way for theÂ businesses, organizations, government and citizens of Council Bluffs to plan and execute a transformation. Our passion, leadership and hard work have infused our community with the anything-is-possible-attitude that makes Council Bluffs Iowa's Leading Edge.

The Chamber has enjoyed progress, success, and the great support from the Council Bluffs area in the last 100 years.

Mission Statement

The Council Bluffs Area Chamber of Commerce will work to enhance the economic growth and prosperity of its members and the Council Bluffs area.

Vision Statement

The Council Bluffs Area Chamber of Commerce is the premier business leadership organization providing âLeading Edgeâ programs and services to its members, new and existing business and industry, and local governments having the desire to make a positive impact on the area.

Statement of Diversity and Inclusion

The Council Bluffs Area Chamber of Commerce strongly supports the freedom all individuals have to express themselves in a respectful and tactful manner. The CB Chamber believes embracing ourÂ differences makes us stronger as a community and as an organization, and allows the values of diversity, equity, and inclusion to grow and expand throughout the Council Bluffs and Pottawattamie County community. The Council Bluffs Area Chamber of Commerce will ensure our staff, leadership,Â programming, events, and communications all embody and foster a diverse, equitable, and inclusive environment for the common good of our members and stakeholders alike.
